mapper.insert: insert into tt_payment(payment_id, payment_date, price, refund, payment_method, member_id, funding_id, payment_key, coupon_record_id) values(#{payment_id}, TO_DATE(#{payment_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),#{price},#{refund},#{payment_method}, #{member_id},#{funding_id},#{payment_key},#{coupon_record_id})
mapper.select: SELECT f.title, f.price, m.nickname AS applicantNickname FROM tt_funding f JOIN tt_member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id WHERE f.funding_id = #{fundingId}
